Key Match Events: Richie Berrington and Michael Leask scored 47* and 35 runs respectively to help Scotland chase down the target in 18.3 overs
Gerhard Erasmus scalped two wickets for Namibia
Brad Wheal scalped three wickets for Scotland
Pre-Game Insights: Namibia posted 155/9 in 20 overs with skipper Gerhard Erasmus scoring 52
Scotland chased down the target in 18.3 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The wicket was a little two-paced
Scotland recovered well from a tough situation to reach the target
Namibia's spinners didn't control the middle phase
Mark Watt had an off day and leaked runs
